text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays #contest Dear TMobile, I will take my wife and little girl on a roadtrip in our new Model 3 - NY to KY to visit my deceased Uncle (from Covid19) then to Bellevue, WA to thank you at all the best wireless network! PS Tuesday mornings are my fav lol. See you soon!
